docs.snippet: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced new rules to curb party practices that may “unduly influence” its members....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced new rules to curb party practices that may “unduly influence” its members.
docs.abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences releases new rules regulating behavior of its members for upcoming Academy Awards season, including provision that limits their attendance of receptions and nonscreening events.

headline.main: Oscar Voters on Notice: Careful With the Caviar
headline.print_headline: Academy Announces New Rules for Oscars

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences

docs.snippet: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro says he is lifting electricity rationing that began more than two months ago because a drought had caused low water levels at the hydroelectric dam that provides most of the country's power....

docs.snippet: Michael Fulmer continued his historic rookie pitching run for the Detroit Tigers, and Victor Martinez contributed three-run home runs from both sides of the plate in a 10-2 romp over the Tampa Bay Rays on Friday night....
